title: Shen is strong
body: It's the truth. Tired of you scrubs talking like he's some worthless urgot. He will be played a ton in LCS. His late game passive, scaling on Q, AoE auto attack block for his team, still has his global tele on TOP of taking teleport and a taunt dash. Pair that with a poppy support or jungle and that's a nightmare to deal with. Also tanky af. This guy is a stocking stuffer no back talk.
